item.title: Platinum End - New anime review
item.author: Author
item.description: What is it? It’s a new show, adapted from the manga work by Tsugumi Ohba, that actually is finished as January 2021. The animation runs in charge of the spun studio of Production I.G, Signal.MD. The wikipedia page holds a neat description of the show, and some good resources to look at, also you can look the official website, although, it is in Japanese. The premise In a World, there exist a God, who seems to be tired, I don’t know, but he is thinking in retirement on 999 days from now; so, the guardian angels are in charge to enroll the new God among the most pitiful humans they can find.

item.title: Takt op. Destiny - New anime review
item.author: Author
item.description: Opening art What is it? Well, it is a new anime in development as a joint venture between Madhouse and Mappa animation studies. That’s right, two of the most prolific and relevant animation houses of the late years – see Attack of Titan and Hunter X Hunter. Right to say that the fundamental development of the story is doing by Bandai and DeNA. Also it will have a mobile game version.
